summary: AN ORDINANCE adopting the 2006 Update to The City of Seattle 2005- 2008 Consolidated Plan for Housing and Community Development, including general policies for the use of the City's funding resources for housing and community development; authorizing the submission of the 2006 Update to the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; authorizing the Human Services Director to make changes to the Plan for certain purposes; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
